item.description:
Spend a Wednesday evening at the MFA on a free admission night - meet your new organizer and fellow Culture Vultures, explore the exhibits, do some holiday shopping in the museum gift shop and have a chat over a glass of wine about the kinds of events you'd like to attend.

You'll also have the opportunity to view one of the Museum's current special exhibits such as Treasures of Assyria or the Karsh 100 photography exhibit (there is an admission charge for these - see mfa website and best to book in advance, last admission is 8 pm.)

Please join us - let's make this a great Meet up group!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside the gift shop, look for a long, multicolored striped scarf!
item.name: Museum of Fine Arts - free admission night!
